name: Dungeon Hunter
description:
• Dungeon Hunter is a Dungeon Crawler, RPG game with procedurally generated dungeons with infinite levels.

Features:

  •  Each level, the quantity of enemies will increase and in some cases new enemies will appear.
  • Basic Quest system,which you can get a quest envolving killing a random special enemy, and then get back to the quest room to get the reward.
  • Random Rooms that appears on floor 5 that can get you to a random NPC or a random Boss.
  • Except for the quest npc, other npcs sell things and they can also buy items from you for the half of the price.
  • Level and skills system.
  • You can change all the colors of the hero sprite in the Character Creator.  

Dev Tools:

  • Most of the Art is From: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
  • Aseprite -> Edit and create some of the sprites.
  • Krita -> Creation of logo.
  • BFXR -> Sound Effects.
  • Rytmik studio -> Game Musics.
  • Godot -> Game Engine( GDScript as the programming language ).

Install Instructions:

  • Download .zip file.
  • Extract all from .zip.
  • Run .exe with the pck file at the same folder as the exe.
